data.title: Information
data.text:
Truman Elementary School, located at the very tip of northern Springfield, was established in 1992. But because of the care of the staff, students, and the community, our building and the energy found inside still feels brand new! We know our students and families by name, and are proud of our rich tradition of academic excellence.

Our school namesake: Harry S. Truman, 33rd President of the United States

Our mascot: We are the Patriots!

Our colors: Red, white and blue

School Song: Patriots United For Success! Click here to go to the song.

Student school day: 7:20 AM to 2:20 PM

School address: 3850 N. Farm Road 159, Springfield, MO 65803

Main Office phone #: 417-523-5100

Facts about Harry S. Truman:
